mutants.code:
def minimum_magic_tricks(T, heights):
    MOD = 1000000008
    max_height = 1000
    m = [0] * (max_height + 1)
    m[1] = 1
    m[2] = 1
    for i in range(3, max_height + 1):
        sum1 = 1
        j = 1
        while j < i - 1:
            sum1 += 2 * m[j]
            j += 1
        m[i] = sum1 % MOD
    results = [m[height] for height in heights]
    return results
